alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 5:14PM CDT until June 14 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ellis County in north central Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 513 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Midlothian, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Grand Prairie, Mansfield, Cedar Hill, Waxahachie, Ennis, Midlothian, Glenn Heights, Red Oak, Ovilla, Venus, Ferris, Palmer, Oak Leaf, Maypearl, Bardwell, Alma, Bardwell Lake, Garrett, Bristol and Pecan Hill. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 392 and 410. Interstate 45 between mile markers 244 and 266. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
